venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
- Ever wonder if you've lived before?

 

- Ever met someone and felt like you've known them before?

 

- Do you have skills and talents for which you've never had training?

 

Come tonight to explore your other lives and discover how they may be affecting your current life and relationships. Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist and Time Traveler, leads you in a group hypnosis session. Bring a pillow, mat, and blanket, if desired.



Preregistration required, as space is limited.

For more information, visit : http://www.hypnosis.ws

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Past Life Regression hypnosis seminar
